app.exercise.testing

Class RPN

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.exercise.testing.RPN

  • public class RPN
extends java.lang.Object
    Executable class that reads in reversed polish notation from standard input and evaluates the expression.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robin Hundt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String[] rpn
      Used to store the individual operands and operators of the RPN.
      private java.util.Stack<Arithmetic> stack
      Stack of Arithmetic objects to store the operands of the reversed polish notation.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public Arithmetic evaluate(java.lang.String input)
        The Format of the input String is first checked with the checkInput(String) method. If the check passes, the input String is split into the String array rpn with whitespace as delimeter. Throws IllegalArgumentException if the format of the input String is wrong. Then evaluates the russian polish notation by using the stack and the operators and operands in rpn. The operators +, -, *, / correspond to Rational.add(Arithmetic), Rational.sub(Arithmetic), Rational.mul(Arithmetic) and Rational.div(Arithmetic)..
        Returns:
        Arithmetic object that is the result of the RPN.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input String has the wrong format or the expression cannot be evaluated.

      • checkInput

        private static boolean checkInput(java.lang.String input)
        checkInput uses regular expressions to check if the input String only consists of positive integers and operators +, -, *, / .
        Parameters:
        input - String to check.
        Returns:
        true if the content of the passed String matches the RPN specifications, otherwise false.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to evaluate reverse polish notation expressions. Uses a BufferedReader to read lines from standard input.
        Parameters:
        args -
